item.description:
Science Fiction writer Neal Stephenson is at MIT on Tuesday, April 17th for an informal conversation with MIT Technology Review’s editor-in-chief Jason Pontin. During the hour-long conversation, they’ll discuss Stephenson’s craft, preoccupations, influences, and inspirations. Afterwards, Stephenson will take 30 minutes of questions from the audience.

 

** YOU MUST HAVE A TICKET TO ATTEND THIS EVENT **

Say you'll be there on Meetup.com but to obtain an "official" ticket" please RSVP on the Eventbrite RSVP page at http://techre.vu/HR8HlD. It’s free and open to the public.
item.name: Legendary Science Fiction Writer Neal Stephenson at MIT
